results.title: Magic lantern set effects slide (Blind man's bluff)
results.brief_description: Wooden magic lantern set effects slide with lever. When lever is moved upwards and downwards, a boy brushes glue on to a man’s back. Another boy is ready to attach a poster to the back.
results.title_for_label: Magic lantern set effects slide (Blind man’s bluff)
results.description: Wooden magic lantern set effects slide with lever. When lever is moved upwards and downwards, a boy brushes glue on to a man’s back. Another boy is ready to attach a poster to the back.

results.title: Magic lantern set effects slide (Blind man's bluff)
results.brief_description: Wooden, handpainted magic lantern set effects slide with two slipping slides. The slide depicts a boy wearing a blindfold, when the slide is pulled left and right, girls move around him.
results.title_for_label: Magic lantern set effects slide (Blind man’s bluff)
results.description: Wooden, handpainted magic lantern set effects slide with two slipping slides. The slide depicts a boy wearing a blindfold, when the slide is pulled left and right, girls move around him.

results.title: Magic lantern set effects slide (La tarte aux oiseaux - the bird pie)
results.brief_description: Hand painted magic lantern set effects slide with wooden frame. A man smiles holding a large pie - by sliding the effects slide, a three birds fly out of the pie and his smile turns in to a frown. Black tape has been adhered to the edge of the sliding section.
results.title_for_label: Magic lantern set effects slide (La tarte aux oiseaux - the bird pie)
results.description: Hand painted magic lantern set effects slide with wooden frame. A man smiles holding a large pie - by sliding the effects slide, a three birds fly out of the pie and his smile turns in to a frown. Black tape has been adhered to the edge of the sliding section.

results.title: Magic lantern set effects slide (Les jouers de cartes - the card players)
results.brief_description: Hand painted magic lantern set effects slipping slide in wooden frame [Les Jouers de Cartes - the Card Players]. By sliding the effects slide, two card players’ heads turn in to a chicken (left) and a dog (right).
results.title_for_label: Magic lantern set effects slide (Les jouers de cartes - the card players)

results.title: Magic lantern slipping slide (Le nez d'arlequin - the harlequin's nose)
results.brief_description: Hand painted magic lantern slipping slide ‘Le Nez d’Arlequin’ -‘ The Harlequin’s Nose’ or ‘Punch with Long Nose’ with wooden frame. Manufactured by E.Mazo, Paris. By moving the slipping slide, a harlequin’s nose grows longer and three small children appear on the tip. The words ‘Punch’s Long Nose’ is etched vertically in to the glass plate.
results.title_for_label: Magic lantern slipping slide (Le nez d’arlequin - the harlequin’s nose)
results.description: Hand painted magic lantern slipping slide ‘Le Nez d’Arlequin’ -‘ The Harlequin’s Nose’ or ‘Punch with Long Nose’ with wooden frame. Manufactured by E.Mazo, Paris. By moving the slipping slide, a harlequin’s nose grows longer and three small children appear on the tip. The words ‘Punch’s Long Nose’ is etched vertically in to the glass plate.
description_for_label: Hand painted magic lantern slipping slide ‘Le Nez d’Arlequin’ -‘ The Harlequin’s Nose’ or ‘Punch with Long Nose’ with wooden frame. Manufactured by E.Mazo, Paris. By moving the slipping slide, a harlequin’s nose grows longer and three small children appear on the tip. The words ‘Punch’s Long Nose’ is etched vertically in to the glass plate.

results.title: Immortal Sergeant cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Immortal Sergeant’ featuring Henry Fonda and Maureen O’Hara by Twentieth Century Fox Picture. Pieces of black tape adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details.
results.description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Immortal Sergeant’ featuring Henry Fonda and Maureen O’Hara by Twentieth Century Fox Picture. Pieces of black tape adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details.

results.title: Billy the Kid cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape and internal black frame. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Billy the Kid’ featuring Robert Taylor distributed by Metro Goldwyn Mayer Pictures Ltd. Pieces of cream tape adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details.
